required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Efficacy and Safety of PRX-100 in the Treatment of Early to Moderate Presbyopia
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Center, Double-Masked Evaluation of the Efficacy and Safety of PRX-100 (Aceclidine/Tropicamide) Ophthalmic Topical Formulation in the Treatment of Early to Moderate Presbyopia

brief_summary.textblock: This is a one-day, randomized, double-masked, single-center evaluation of the efficacy and safety of PRX-100 ophthalmic solution compared to placebo in 20 subjects (randomized 4:1, PRX-100:placebo) to evaluate the safety of PRX-100 and the magnitude and duration of effects on improving near-vision acuity.

primary_outcome.measure: binocular assessment of uncorrected near visual acuity
